name: QLPreviewPanel
desc: A class that implements the Quick Look preview panel to display a preview of a list of items.

items.name: class func shared() -> QLPreviewPanel!
items.desc: Returns the shared Quick Look preview panel instance.

items.name: class func sharedPreviewPanelExists() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the system has created a shared Quick Look preview panel.

items.name: var currentController: Any!
items.desc: The current first responder accepting to control the preview panel.

items.name: func updateController()
items.desc: Asks the preview panel to update its current controller.

items.name: func reloadData()
items.desc: Asks the preview panel to reload its data from its data source.

items.name: func refreshCurrentPreviewItem()
items.desc: Asks the preview panel to recompute the preview of the current preview item.

items.name: var currentPreviewItemIndex: Int
items.desc: The index of the current preview item.

items.name: var delegate: AnyObject!
items.desc: The delegate object that controls the preview panel’s behavior.

items.name: func enterFullScreenMode(NSScreen!, withOptions: [AnyHashable : Any]!) -> Bool
items.desc: Instructs the panel to enter full screen mode.

items.name: func exitFullScreenMode(options: [AnyHashable : Any]!)
items.desc: Instructs the panel to exit full screen mode.

items.name: var isInFullScreenMode: Bool
items.desc: The property that indicates whether the panel is in full screen mode.
